description: でかプの統計情報を表示します

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all_delta_1m")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all_delta_1m")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> movingAverage(n: 60)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Tokyo")

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 9h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "credit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["user"] == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

import "date"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      time: r._time,
      value: r._value,
  }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "playtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

import "math"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpm_max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: float(v: math.floor(x: r._value))
      }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "slot_hit")

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "slot_startfev")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "buy_shbi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")

panels.title: スキルポイント使用数

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "task_cnt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bbox_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "task_cnt" or r._field == "bbox_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if exists r.task_cnt and r.task_cnt != 0.0 
              then float(v: r.bbox_all) / float(v: r.task_cnt) 
              else 0.0
    }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jack_startmax")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)

panels.title: パレッタチャンス挑戦回数

targets.query:
jacksp = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_get_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "jacksp_value"})

pallot = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pallot_value"})

join(tables: {jacksp: jacksp, pallot: pallot}, on: ["user"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if exists r.pallot_value and r.pallot_value != 0.0
              then float(v: r.jacksp_value) / float(v: r.pallot_value)
              else 0.0,
  }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jack_totalmax_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_totalmax")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "dc_palball_get_100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

panels.description:
この値が増えていく場合はクルーン抽選速度より速い速度でパレッタボールを獲得してしまっており、内部ストックがたまっている状況。

なおY軸の値が内部ストック値ではない。ストックがあるままRejoinすると値がずれていくのでオフセットが乗っかる場合があることに留意すること。（値にとらわれず上下の変化を見ること）

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "palball_get" or r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey:["_field"], valueColumn:"_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: r.palball_get - r.pallot_lot_t0
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "difference")

panels.title: パレッタボール内部ストック

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jack_get")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_get_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "dc_palball_get_100" or r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if exists r.pallot_lot_t0 and r.pallot_lot_t0 != 0.0 
              then float(v: r.dc_palball_get_100) / float(v: r.pallot_lot_t0) 
              else 0.0
    }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_get_t0" or r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _measurement: "シングル",
      _value: if exists r.pallot_lot_t0 and r.pallot_lot_t0 != 0.0 then float(v: r.jacksp_get_t0) / float(v: r.pallot_lot_t0) else 0.0
    }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_get_t1" or r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _measurement: "ダブル",
      _value: if exists r.pallot_lot_t0 and r.pallot_lot_t0 != 0.0 then float(v: r.jacksp_get_t1) / float(v: r.pallot_lot_t0) else 0.0
    }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_get_t2" or r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _measurement: "マッシブ",
      _value: if exists r.pallot_lot_t0 and r.pallot_lot_t0 != 0.0 then float(v: r.jacksp_get_t2) / float(v: r.pallot_lot_t0) else 0.0
    }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jacksp_get_t3" or r._field == "pallot_lot_t0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _measurement: "ヘブン",
      _value: if exists r.pallot_lot_t0 and r.pallot_lot_t0 != 0.0 then float(v: r.jacksp_get_t3) / float(v: r.pallot_lot_t0) else 0.0
    }))

jacksp = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata" and r._field == "jacksp_get_all" and r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "PJP獲得数"}))

pallot = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata" and r._field == "pallot_lot_t0" and r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "ボール獲得数"}))

ratio = join(
    tables: {jacksp: jacksp, pallot: pallot},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _field: "PJP当選率",
      _value: if exists r._value_pallot and r._value_pallot != 0.0
              then float(v: r._value_jacksp) / float(v: r._value_pallot)
              else 0.0
  }))

union(tables: [jacksp, pallot, ratio])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "PJP当選率")

panels.description: 数値が大きいほど遠心分離しゃる

targets.query:

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")

panels.title: 1時間当たりの進行回数推移

panels.description: 小さいほどUMコンボを狙いやすい

targets.query:
sqr = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sqr_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "sqr_step"})

jack = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jack_get")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "jack_get"})

join(tables: {sqr: sqr, jack: jack}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if r.jack_get > 0.0 
              then float(v: r.sqr_step) / (float(v: r.jack_get) * 16.0) 
              else 0.0
    }))

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sqr_get")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sqr_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sqr_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ult_combomax")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sqr_step" or r._field == "jack_get")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey:["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if exists r.jack_get and r.jack_get > 0.0 
              then float(v: r.sqr_step) / (float(v: r.jack_get) * 16.0) 
              else 0.0
    }))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ult_totalmax_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^l_totems_set_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _field:
        if r._field == "l_totems_set_1" then "祭壇1"
        else if r._field == "l_totems_set_2" then "祭壇2"
        else if r._field == "l_totems_set_3" then "祭壇3"
        else if r._field == "l_totems_set_4" then "祭壇4"
        else if r._field == "l_totems_set_5" then "祭壇5"
        else r._field,
      _value:
        if r._value == 0 then "なし"
        else if r._value == 1 then "橙"
        else if r._value == 2 then "緑"
        else if r._value == 4 then "ピンク"
        else if r._value == 5 then "紫"
        else if r._value == 6 then "白"
        else if r._value == 7 then "水色"
        else if r._value == 8 then "灰桜"
        else if r._value == 9 then "群青"
        else if r._value == 10 then "赤"
        else if r._value == 11 then "クリーム"
        else if r._value == 12 then "ミント"
        else if r._value == 13 then "ピーチ"
        else if r._value == 14 then "星空"
        else if r._value == 15 then "草原"
        else if r._value == 16 then "黒"
        else if r._value == 17 then "黄"
        else if r._value == 18 then "ラベンダー"
        else if r._value == 19 then "ライム"
        else string(v: r._value)
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_ball_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
          if r._field == "dc_ball_get_0" then "ノーマル"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_1" then "橙"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_2" then "緑"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_3" then "虹"

          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_14" then "星空"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_15" then "草原"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_16" then "黒"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_17" then "黄"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_18" then "ラベンダー"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_19" then "ライム"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_90" then "没シャルベ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_100" then "ゴールデン"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_101" then "アメジスト"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_102" then "エメラルド"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_103" then "ローズクォーツ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_104" then "トパーズ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_334" then "抽選"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_335" then "抽選（特殊効果）"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_ball_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

data = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_ball_get_/)

          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_12" then "ミント"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_13" then "ピーチ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_14" then "星空"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_15" then "草原"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_16" then "黒"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_17" then "黄"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_18" then "ラベンダー"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_19" then "ライム"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_90" then "没シャルベ"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_100" then "ゴールデン"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_101" then "アメジスト"

          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_334" then "抽選"
          else if r._field == "dc_ball_get_335" then "抽選（特殊効果）"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_ball_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

totals = data
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "total"})

join(
  tables: {d: data, t: totals},
  on: ["_time"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _field: r._field,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / float(v: r.total) * 100.0
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

panels.description: 日本標準時で午前9時を基準にリセット

targets.query:
import "timezone"
import "strings"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Tokyo")

ball = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata" and r._field == "ball_get" and r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 9h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)

balls = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata" and r._field =~ /^dc_ball_get_/ and r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, offset: 9h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)

join(
  tables: {balls: balls, ball: ball},
  on: ["_time"],
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: if r._value_ball == 0.0 then 0.0 else float(v: r._value_balls) / float(v: r._value_ball) * 100.0
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field_balls", "_value"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field_balls:
          if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_0" then "ノーマル"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_1" then "橙"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_2" then "緑"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_3" then "虹"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_4" then "ピンク"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_5" then "紫"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_6" then "白"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_7" then "水色"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_8" then "灰桜"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_9" then "群青"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_10" then "赤"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_11" then "クリーム"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_12" then "ミント"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_13" then "ピーチ"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_14" then "星空"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_15" then "草原"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_16" then "黒"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_17" then "黄"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_18" then "ラベンダー"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_19" then "ライム"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_90" then "没シャルベ"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_100" then "ゴールデン"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_101" then "アメジスト"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_102" then "エメラルド"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_103" then "ローズクォーツ"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_104" then "トパーズ"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_334" then "抽選"
          else if r._field_balls == "dc_ball_get_335" then "抽選（特殊効果）"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field_balls, t: "dc_ball_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))

panels.title: 最大ボールチェイン数

targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "medal_get")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_medal_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
        if r._field == "dc_medal_get_0" then "ノーマル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_1" then "橙(ルーレット)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_2" then "緑"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_3" then "ピンク"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_4" then "紫"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_5" then "水色"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_6" then "壁メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_7" then "スキルメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_12" then "緑10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_13" then "赤10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_14" then "紫10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_15" then "ゴールデンメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_16" then "棒金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_17" then "棒金メダルx10"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_18" then "クソデカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_19" then "クソデカ金メダルx10"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_20" then "クソデカ金メダルx100"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_100" then "虹メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_101" then "金メダル(ボツ枠)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_102" then "サファイア"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_103" then "ルビー"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_104" then "エメラルド"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_105" then "ダイヤモンド"
        else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_medal_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

import "strings"

data = from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_medal_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _field:
        if r._field == "dc_medal_get_0" then "ノーマル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_1" then "橙(ルーレット)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_2" then "緑"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_3" then "ピンク"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_4" then "紫"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_5" then "水色"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_6" then "壁メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_7" then "スキルメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_12" then "緑10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_13" then "赤10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_14" then "紫10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_15" then "ゴールデンメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_16" then "棒金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_17" then "棒金メダルx10"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_18" then "クソデカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_19" then "クソデカ金メダルx10"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_20" then "クソデカ金メダルx100"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_100" then "虹メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_101" then "金メダル(ボツ枠)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_102" then "サファイア"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_103" then "ルビー"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_104" then "エメラルド"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_105" then "ダイヤモンド"
        else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_medal_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

totals = data
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "total"})

join(
  tables: {d: data, t: totals},
  on: ["_time"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _field: r._field,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / float(v: r.total) * 100.0
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "medal_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "medal_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "medal_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_medal_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
        if r._field == "dc_medal_get_0" then "ノーマル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_1" then "橙(ルーレット)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_2" then "緑"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_3" then "ピンク"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_4" then "紫"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_5" then "水色"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_6" then "壁メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_7" then "スキルメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_12" then "緑10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_13" then "赤10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_14" then "紫10倍"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_15" then "ゴールデンメダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_16" then "棒金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_17" then "棒金メダルx10"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_18" then "クソデカ金メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_19" then "クソデカ金メダルx10"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_20" then "クソデカ金メダルx100"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_100" then "虹メダル"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_101" then "金メダル(ボツ枠)"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_102" then "サファイア"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_103" then "ルビー"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_104" then "エメラルド"
        else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_105" then "ダイヤモンド"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_medal_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "dc_medal_get_7")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)

title: でかプ実績
